Subject: Cannot reset password
Description: I've tried to reset my password multiple times but I never receive the reset email. I've checked my spam folder and it's not there either. Please help!

Subject: Love the new dashboard!
Description: Just wanted to say the new dashboard design is fantastic! Much easier to navigate and find what I need. Great work team!

Subject: Billing charge incorrect
Description: I was charged $99 but my plan should be $49/month. Can someone please review my account and issue a refund for the difference?

Subject: Feature request: API access
Description: Would it be possible to add API access so we can integrate your tool with our internal systems? This would be extremely valuable for our workflow.

Subject: App keeps logging me out
Description: The mobile app logs me out every few hours and I have to re-enter my credentials. This is very frustrating when I'm trying to work on the go.

Subject: Data not syncing
Description: My uploaded data from yesterday is not showing up in the dashboard. I've tried refreshing multiple times but it's still not there.

Subject: Great customer support!
Description: I had an issue last week and your support team was incredibly helpful and responsive. Thank you for the excellent service!

Subject: Need more export options
Description: Currently can only export to PDF. Would love to have Excel and CSV export options as well for further analysis.

Subject: Page load times are slow
Description: The dashboard takes 10-15 seconds to load. This is much slower than it used to be. Has something changed recently?

Subject: Tutorial videos are helpful
Description: The new tutorial videos in the help section are really helpful for understanding the features. More of these would be great!

Subject: Cannot upload large files
Description: When I try to upload files larger than 5MB I get an error message. I need to upload larger datasets for my analysis.

Subject: Add multi-language support
Description: Our team is international and we would benefit greatly from having the interface available in Spanish and French.

Subject: Email notifications not working
Description: I have notifications enabled but I'm not receiving any emails when new insights are ready. Please fix this.

Subject: Pricing page is confusing
Description: The pricing page doesn't clearly explain what's included in each tier. More details would help me choose the right plan.
